text: Fomɨra Seban Amizir Atrivimɨn nguazir kamɨn saghon ikegha Solomonɨn fofozir aghuimɨn akaba baraghasa ize. Ezɨ gumazir mam bar Solomon gafiragha ian tongɨn iti. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Gumazamiziba Godɨn Kotiamɨn Tuivamin Dughiamɨn, Seban Amizir Atrivim tugh datɨrɨghɨn itir gumazamizibar arazir kurabar gun mɨkɨmam.
